title: P7 How do I disable power-intensive notification?
answer:
Go to **Settings**, and touch **Power saving**. Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35549)> **Settings**, and disable **Power-intensive prompt**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35550)


 Note: The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
